page.title: 17STAPLEFIELD COURT CUCKFIELD
page.content: Staplefield Court is a Residential Rest Home Class 3, with accomodation for 30 residents and is set in 14 acres of grounds ,with fine country views,and is surrounded by gardens with well stocked flower beds.There is a spacious lounge on the ground floor with a large screen colour television and video recorder.Meals and special diets are prepared by a full time cook and served in the dining room. There are visits on a regular basis from a Dr.,dentist,chriropodist,hairdresser and occupational therapist.The mobile library leaves a selection of books. The house was built in 1912 and has been a private residence until 1983 when it was converted to an old peo- ples rest home.The present owners bought the property in June 1985 and intend to run it as a Rest Home for the forseeable future.
